verses.text: Oh \w that|strong="H5414"\w* my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* were \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* a \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, that I might \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w* for the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!\f + \fr 9.1 \ft Oh…: Heb. Who will give my head, etc\f*

Oh \w that|strong="H5414"\w* I had in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* a lodging \w place|strong="H4411"\w* of wayfaring \w men|strong="H0732"\w*; that I might \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* from them! for they \add be\add* all \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*, an \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w* of treacherous \w men|strong="H0898"\w*.

And they \w bend|strong="H1869"\w* their \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \add like\add* their \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \add for\add* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*: but they are not \w valiant|strong="H1396"\w* for the \w truth|strong="H0530"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; for they \w proceed|strong="H3318"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* to \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Take ye \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* ye not in any \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: for every \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* will \w utterly|strong="H6117"\w* \w supplant|strong="H6117"\w*, and every \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* with \w slanders|strong="H7400"\w*.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft neighbour: or, friend\f*

And they will \w deceive|strong="H2048"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and will not \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* the \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*: they have \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, \add and\add* \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* themselves to commit \w iniquity|strong="H5753"\w*.\f + \fr 9.5 \ft deceive: or, mock\f*

Thine \w habitation|strong="H3427"\w* \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*; through \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* they \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, Behold, I will \w melt|strong="H6884"\w* them, and \w try|strong="H0974"\w* them; for how shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*?

Their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is as\add* an \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* shot \w out|strong="H7819"\w*; it \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*: \add one\add* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* with his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, but in \w heart|strong="H7130"\w* he \w layeth|strong="H7760"\w* his \w wait|strong="H0696"\w*.\f + \fr 9.8 \ft in heart: Heb. in the midst of him\f*\f + \fr 9.8 \ft his wait: or, wait for him\f*

¶ Shall I not \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* them for these \add things\add*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: shall not my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* be \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* on such a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* as this?

For the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* will I take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* and \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w*, and for the \w habitations|strong="H4999"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* a \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*, because they are burned \w up|strong="H3341"\w*, so that \w none|strong="H0376"\w* can \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through \add them;\add* neither can \add men\add* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*; both the \w fowl|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* are \w fled|strong="H5074"\w*; they are \w gone|strong="H1980"\w*.\f + \fr 9.10 \ft habitations: or, pastures\f*\f + \fr 9.10 \ft burned up: or, desolate\f*\f + \fr 9.10 \ft both…: Heb. from the fowl even to, etc\f*

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w*, \add and\add* a \w den|strong="H4583"\w* of \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*; and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 9.11 \ft desolate: Heb. desolation\f*

¶ Who \add is\add* the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, that may \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* this? and \add who is he\add* to whom the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, that he may \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* it, for what the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w perisheth|strong="H0006"\w* \add and\add* is burned \w up|strong="H3341"\w* like a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, that none passeth \w through|strong="H5674"\w*?

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* my \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, neither \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* therein;

But have \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, which their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* them:\f + \fr 9.14 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* them, \add even\add* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, with \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*, and give them \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them also among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, whom neither they nor their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w known|strong="H3045"\w*: and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, till I have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w Consider|strong="H0995"\w* ye, and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* for the mourning \w women|strong="H6969"\w*, that they may \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; and \w send|strong="H7971"\w* for \w cunning|strong="H2450"\w* \add women\add*, that they may \w come|strong="H0935"\w*:

And let them make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, and take \w up|strong="H5375"\w* a \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* for us, that our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* may run \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, and our \w eyelids|strong="H6079"\w* gush \w out|strong="H5140"\w* with \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

For a \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* is \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, How are we \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*! we are \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, because we have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, because our \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w* have cast \add us\add* \w out|strong="H7993"\w*.

Yet \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O ye \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and let your \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0802"\w* her \w neighbour|strong="H7468"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H7015"\w*.

For \w death|strong="H4194"\w* is come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into our \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*, \add and\add* is \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into our \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w children|strong="H5768"\w* from \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, \add and\add* the young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* from the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*.

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Even the \w carcases|strong="H5038"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* as \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* upon the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and as the \w handful|strong="H5995"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w harvestman|strong="H7114"\w*, and none shall \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \add them\add*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Let not the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* in his \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, neither let the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \add man\add* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* in his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, let not the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* \add man\add* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* in his \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*:

But let him that \w glorieth|strong="H1984"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* in this, that he \w understandeth|strong="H7919"\w* and \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* me, that I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* which \w exercise|strong="H6213"\w* \w lovingkindness|strong="H2617"\w*, \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for in these \add things\add* I \w delight|strong="H2654"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* all \add them which are\add* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* with the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6190"\w*;\f + \fr 9.25 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

\w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and all \add that are\add* in the \w utmost|strong="H7112"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w*, that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: for all \add these\add* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \add are\add* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 9.26 \ft in the utmost…: Heb. cut off into corners, or, having the corners of their hair polled\f*
